---
name: Feature Request
about: I have an idea!
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ""
---

## What's your idea?

Describe what you want added. Dream big!

## Why would this be useful?

What problem would this solve for you? Or would it just make your life easier?

## How do you imagine it working?

Walk me through it. Like "When I click X, I want Y to happen..."

## When would you use this?

Give me a real example. Like "I want this because when I'm downloading from [website], I wish I could..."

## Anything else?

Screenshots of what you're thinking? Examples from other extensions? Whatever helps explain your idea!
